entry.string: You master site directory #(1) does not exist! Please create it first!
entry.translation: ¡No existe tu directorio maestro #(1) del sitio! ¡Por favor créalo primero!

entry.string: The Site Data Directory #(1) is not writeable!\nPlease chmod 777 and try again.
entry.translation: El Directorio #(1) de Datos del Sito no es escribible!\nPor favor haz chmod 777 e intenta de nuevo.

entry.string: The master config.system.php file /var/config.system.php is not writeable!\n Please chmod 666 and try again.
entry.translation: The master config.system.php file /var/config.system.php is not writeable!\n Please chmod 666 and try again.

entry.string: The Site Data Directory #(1)/#(2)/var is not writeable!
entry.translation: ¡El Directorio #(1)/#(2)/var de Datos del Sitio no es escribible!
